parsed_job:

    "job_title": "Software Engineer III, Full Stack, Infrastructure",

        "Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience",
        "2 years of software development experience",
        "2 years of experience with data structures or algorithms",
        "2 years of full stack development experience"
    ]

comparison_result.title: Software Engineer III, Full Stack, Infrastructure
key_strengths: Front-end development expertise with JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS

Strong background in building web applications
